verses.verse: When Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H5394><s%>, and shall cast out many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H2850><s%>, the Hittite, and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%>, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> and mightier than thou <S%H6099><s%>;

and when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them up before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H5221><s%>, and thou shalt smite them <S%H2763><s%>; then thou shalt utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H3772><s%>: thou shalt make no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H2603><s%>, nor show mercy unto them;

neither shalt thou make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them <S%H1323><s%>; thy daughter thou shalt not give <S%H5414><s%> unto his son <S%H1121><s%>, nor his daughter <S%H1323><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> unto thy son <S%H1121><s%>.

For he will turn away <S%H5493><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> me <S%H5647><s%>, that they may serve other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>: so will the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you <S%H8045><s%>, and he will destroy thee quickly <S%H4118><s%>.

But thus shall ye deal <S%H6213><s%> with them <S%H7665><s%>: ye shall break down their altars <S%H4196><s%>, and dash <S%H7665><s%> in pieces their pillars <S%H4676><s%>, and hew down <S%H1438><s%> their Asherim <S%H842><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> their graven images <S%H6456><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

For thou art a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> thee to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for his own possession <S%H5459><s%>, above all peoples <S%H5971><s%> that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> did not set his love <S%H2836><s%> upon you <S%H977><s%>, nor choose you <S%H7230><s%>, because ye were more in number than any people <S%H5971><s%>; for ye were the fewest <S%H4592><s%> of all peoples <S%H5971><s%>:

but because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth you <S%H8104><s%>, and because he would keep the oath <S%H7621><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, hath Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out <S%H3318><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>, from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, he is God <S%H430><s%>, the faithful <S%H539><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, who keepeth <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> with them that love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>,

and repayeth <S%H7999><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him to their face <S%H6440><s%>, to destroy <S%H6><s%> them <S%H309><s%>: he will not be slack to him that hateth <S%H8130><s%> him <S%H7999><s%>, he will repay him to his face <S%H6440><s%>.

Thou shalt therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to do them <S%H6213><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H6118><s%>, because ye hearken <S%H8085><s%> to these ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>, that Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> with thee the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>:

and he will love <S%H157><s%> thee <S%H1288><s%>, and bless thee <S%H7235><s%>, and multiply thee <S%H1288><s%>; he will also bless the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, thy grain <S%H1715><s%> and thy new wine <S%H8492><s%> and thine oil <S%H3323><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy cattle <S%H504><s%> and the young <S%H6251><s%> of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give thee <S%H5414><s%>.
Thou shalt be blessed <S%H1288><s%> above all peoples <S%H5971><s%>: there shall not be male <S%H6135><s%> or female barren <S%H6135><s%> among you <S%H929><s%>, or among your cattle.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will take away <S%H5493><s%> from thee all sickness <S%H2483><s%>; and none of the evil <S%H7451><s%> diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>, will he put <S%H7760><s%> upon thee <S%H5414><s%>, but will lay them upon all them that hate thee <S%H8130><s%>.

And thou shalt consume <S%H398><s%> all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> unto thee <S%H5869><s%>; thine eye shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> them <S%H5647><s%>: neither shalt thou serve their gods <S%H430><s%>; for that will be a snare unto thee <S%H4170><s%>.
If thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, These nations <S%H1471><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> than I <S%H349><s%>; how can <S%H3201><s%> I dispossess them <S%H3423><s%>?

thou shalt not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them <S%H2142><s%>: thou shalt well remember <S%H2142><s%> what Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and unto all Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;

the great <S%H1419><s%> trials <S%H4531><s%> which thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, and the signs <S%H226><s%>, and the wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and the outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, whereby Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought thee out <S%H3318><s%>: so shall Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of whom thou art afraid <S%H3373><s%>.

Moreover Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> among them <S%H7604><s%>, until they that are left, and hide <S%H5641><s%> themselves <S%H6><s%>, perish from before thee <S%H6440><s%>.

Thou shalt not be affrighted <S%H6206><s%> at <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H1419><s%>, a great God <S%H410><s%> and a terrible <S%H3372><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will cast out <S%H5394><s%> those <S%H411><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee by little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%>: thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not consume <S%H3615><s%> them at once <S%H4118><s%>, lest the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> increase upon thee <S%H7235><s%>.

But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them up before thee <S%H6440><s%>, and will discomfit <S%H1949><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> discomfiture <S%H4103><s%>, until they be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>.

And he will deliver <S%H5414><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and thou shalt make their name <S%H8034><s%> to perish <S%H6><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>: there shall no man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H8045><s%>, until thou have destroyed them.

The graven images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%> shall ye burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: thou shalt not covet <S%H2530><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> or the gold <S%H2091><s%> that is on them <S%H3947><s%>, nor take it unto thee <S%H3369><s%>, lest thou be snared therein <S%H8441><s%>; for it is an abomination to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.

And thou shalt not bring <S%H935><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> into thy house <S%H1004><s%>, and become a devoted thing <S%H2764><s%> like unto it <S%H8262><s%>: thou shalt utterly detest <S%H8262><s%> it <S%H8581><s%>, and thou shalt utterly abhor <S%H8581><s%> it <S%H2764><s%>; for it is a devoted thing.
